name: Frankenstein's Catboy
description:
I sought to unravel the secrets of life and death...

But this...

This was a meownster!

A story about revenge, tragedy, and poor little meow meows. Based on Mary Shelley's classic novel and created for NaNoReNo 2022.

Features

  • 4500 words, around 30 minutes playtime.
  • Three endings.
  • A catboy.

Credits

  • Images edited from Pexels.
  • Music from Slaleky's Retro and Electronic Music Pack and sound from AudioMicro.
